item.title: Experience the delightful combination of fragrance and culinary delights at Café Wolseley Bangkok and Jo Malone London
item.description:
Café Wolseley Bangkok and Jo Malone London have partnered to create a luxurious British experience, blending Café Wolseley’s culinary talents with Jo Malone London’s signature scents. Source: Café Wolseley Bangkok. Café Wolseley Bangkok’s Through the Grapevine menu is inspired by the aromatic notes of Jo Malone’s Cypress & Grapevine Cologne Intense. This collaboration celebrates the launch of Jo Malone London’s Cypress & Grapevine Cologne Intense. Available from July 1st to August 31st, guests can experience the Through the Grapevine lunch menu at Café Wolseley Bangkok...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-delightful-combination-of-fragrance-and-culinary-delights-at-caf-wolseley-bangkok-and-jo-malone-london/

item.title: In March, Dario Cecchini explores culinary partnerships
item.description:
The renowned Bottega di Carna at the Mondrian Singapore Duxton, known for its unique dining experience crafted by “World’s Greatest Butcher” Dario Cecchini, is excited to announce upcoming collaborations this March. The restaurant’s philosophy centers around respecting the entire animal and utilizing traditional methods to showcase the finest produce and ingredients. Cecchini Returns with Exciting Collaborations Bottega di Carna X Bold & Braised Hawker Pop-up March 6th-7th Cecchini and Bottega di Carna’s Head Chef Kenny Huang are joining forces with local Chinatown eatery Bold & Braised at Maxwell Food Centre...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/in-march-dario-cecchini-explores-culinary-partnerships/

item.title: Usagyuuun will make an appearance in the Claw Stars universe
item.description:
Source: Appxplore. The mobile game Claw Stars will soon feature characters from the popular sticker app, Usagyuuun. Minto, the company behind Usagyuuun, and Appxplore, the developer of Claw Stars, are collaborating to bring the beloved sticker character to the award-winning mobile game. This marks the first game collaboration for Minto, a global leader in character IPs with over 6 billion downloads worldwide. Appxplore, known for its expertise in game development and creator of games with over 40 million downloads, sees this partnership as a strategic move to merge its experience with the massive popularity of Usagyuuun...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/usagyuuun-will-make-an-appearance-in-the-claw-stars-universe/
